Release 0.6.7
==================================

Built-in plugins
------------------

* ``guess-csv`` guesses "t" and "f" as a boolean value.

General Changes
------------------

* Added ``selfupdate`` subcommand. This command updates embulk itself to the released latest version.
* Upgraded library dependency of Guice from 3.0 to 4.0.

Release Date
------------------
2015-05-06
